title: New: Noble Oak – Dissolve
content:
When it comes to glisteningly pristine dream pop, there are few around better at it than Canada’s Noble Oak.

Four and a half minutes of hopeless longing, I find myself saying it every single time when writing about Noble Oak, but this guy deserves a much larger audience.

if i let you slip away i hope i never live it down

and i know in time i just may, now
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
